snippet: A man from Pennsylvania was found with a backpack filled with materials that suggested carrying out a terrorist attack.
abstract: Federal authorities announce Pennsylvania teenager Jalil Ibn Ameer Aziz has been arrested for providing material support to terrorists; Aziz had pledge allegiance to Islamic State group, used Twitter to spread its propaganda and possessed backpack full of ammunition.
lead_paragraph: A man from Pennsylvania was found with a backpack filled with materials that suggested carrying out a terrorist attack.

headline.main: 19-Year-Old From Pennsylvania Charged in Terror Plot

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
